coreAtributes.name: Varia Suit
coreAtributes.description: She who wears armor today is she who may wear armor tomorrow.

displacementText.playerSelf: You take off the Varia suit.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name]'s Varia suit and start to tear it apart piece by piece.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your Varia suit and starts to tear it apart piece by piece.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s Varia suit and starts to tear it apart piece by piece.

replacementText.playerSelf: You put on the Varia suit.
replacementText.playerNPC: You put the Varia suit on [npc.Name].
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.Name] still as you roughly force the Varia suit onto [npc.her].
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] equips you with the Varia suit.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly forces the Varia suit onto you.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] holds [npc2.name] still as [npc1.she] roughly forces the Varia suit onto [npc2.name].

displacementText.playerSelf: You spend some time removing parts of your Varia suit.
displacementText.playerNPC: You spend some time removing parts of [npc.name]'s Varia suit.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name] and start to tear off the pieces of [npc.her] Varia suit.
displacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] spends some time removing parts of [npc.her] Varia suit.
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] spends some time removing parts of your Varia suit.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of you and starts to tear off the pieces of your Varia suit.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] spends some time removing parts of [npc2.name]'s Varia suit.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name] and starts to tear off the pieces of [npc2.her] Varia suit.

replacementText.playerSelf: You put back the missing pieces on your Varia suit.
replacementText.playerNPC: You put back the missing pieces on [npc.name]'s Varia suit.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you haphazardly piece together [npc.her] Varia suit.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] puts back the missing pieces on her Varia suit.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] puts back the missing pieces of your Varia suit.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] haphazardly piece together your Varia suit.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] puts back the missing pieces together [npc2.name]'s Varia suit.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] grabs hold [npc2.name] and starts to haphazardly piece together [npc2.her] Varia suit.
